author: Promit Mukherjee
title: Coca-Cola's African subsidiary eyes more consolidation in continent - Reuters.com
description: Coca-Cola Beverages Africa (CCBA), the biggest bottling unit of Coca-Cola in the continent, is eyeing further consolidation of the parent's bottling operations there, its chief executive said on Tuesday, as it prepares to go public.

author: ahartmans@businessinsider.com (Avery Hartmans)
title: Coca-Cola will launch a Fresca canned cocktail with the company behind Corona. It's part of a broader shift in the alcohol industry as hard seltzer's popularity fades.
description: Coca-Cola is one of several beverage-producers coming up with new ways to marry alcohol with popular soft drinks.

author: Zacks Equity Research
title: Constellation Brands' (STZ) Q3 Sales & Earnings Beat Estimates
description: Constellation Brands' (STZ) Q3 results reflect continued strength in the beer business, aided by strong demand. The company enters partnership with Coca-Cola for FRESCA Mixed cocktails.

title: Big brands call for global pact to cut plastic production - Reuters
description: International brands including Coca Cola and PepsiCo called on Monday for a global pact to combat plastic pollution that includes cuts in plastic production, a key growth area for the oil industry.

author: Ash Parrish
title: Lego delays Overwatch 2 set as company reevaluates relationship with Activision Blizzard
description: Lego has delayed the release of an Overwatch 2-themed Lego set as the toymaker reviews its relationship with Overwatch 2 developer Activision Blizzard amid the company’s numerous lawsuits alleging widespread workplace harassment and discrimination.

description: Coca-Cola Co (KO.N) will launch Simply-branded alcoholic drinks in the United States this summer in partnership with beer giant Molson Coors Beverage Co

title: Salesforce, AT&T, Alibaba, Wayfair - Reuters
description: Wall Street's main indexes were mixed on Wednesday ahead of minutes from the Federal Reserve's December meeting, as investors swapped technology stocks for cyclicals that stand to benefit from a high interest rate environment.

title: H&R Block hires new top lawyer from cannabis producer Tilray - Reuters
description: H&R Block Inc has recruited its new top lawyer from Tilray Inc, hiring Dara Redler, the Canadian cannabis producer's interim chief legal officer.

title: : Coca-Cola partners with Constellation Brands to add alcohol to Fresca

title: Lego delaying Overwatch 2 set because of Activision workplace culture
description: Lego has indefinitely delayed the release of an Overwatch 2 themed set of bricks in response to the workplace culture at Activision Blizzard.

title: I was a misfit when I joined the Nuggets, says MVP Jokic - Reuters
description: Nikola Jokic struggled in the fledgling stages of his National Basketball Association's (NBA) career when he joined the Denver Nuggets and had to change his diet to become the league's most valuable player in 2021, the Serbian centre said.

title: Warren Buffett was invited to buy a stake in Dunkin' Donuts — but declined to get caught up in a takeover fight
description: The sweet-toothed investor, whose company owns See's Candies and Dairy Queen, turned down a chance to own a chunk of the donut-shop chain in 1989.
